QuestData.Title: Potent Protection
QuestData.Description:
Here ya go, I got them onions bundled up nicely for ya.
Give my regards to Miss Waycrest, will ya? Her allies are welcome on my farm anytime.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Sack of Aromatic Onions to Lucille Waycrest at Watchman's Rise.
QuestData.RewardText:
The coven is vulnerable to onions!? I remember my nan used to tell stories about them warding off evil, but I never thought to take it literally!
This is quite the discovery!
